## [PLFM Discussion Group](../content/events/weekly.qmd)

We meet weekly to discuss papers in the areas of programming languages and software verification, and to discuss the group itself.
The goal is to encourage interactions and discussions between students, researchers, and faculty with interests in these areas.
Our meetings are open to everybody interested in these topics.
